experience.title: Software Engineer at SoftExpert
experience.description: Development and maintenance of the System in both the backend and the frontend, focusing on solutions for excellence in Management and Business Compliance. Analysis and implementation of new components and functionalities within the system, always aiming at their quality and performance. Main technologies and tools used on a daily basis: PHP, PHPUnit, Doctrine, Rest, Javascript, React, PostgreSQL, Oracle, SQLServer, Docker, Git, Jira, Gitlab and Scrum for project management and planning.
